          <title>
            <string language="en">A windmill</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine Windmühle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Un moulin à vent</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Um moinho de vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Un mulino a vento</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ένας ανεμόμυλος</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Un molino de viento</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This illustration shows a windmill that captures the energy from the wind. This is a renewable source of energy.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">non-renewable energy source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">renewable energy source</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wind</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">windmill</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildung zeigt eine Windmühle, die die 
Energie vom Wind erfaßt. Dieses ist eine auswechselbare Quelle 
von Energie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cette illustration montre un moulin à vent qui 
capture l'énergie du vent. C'est une source renouvelable 
d'énergie.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Esta ilustração mostra um moinho de vento que 
capture a energia do vento. Esta é uma fonte renewable da 
energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questa illustrazione mostra un mulino a vento che 
blocca l'energia proveniente dal vento. Ciò è una sorgente 
rinnovabile di energia.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει έναν ανεμόμυλο που 
συλλαμβάνει την ενέργεια από τον αέρα. Αυτό είναι μια 
ανανεώσιμη πηγή ενέργειας.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Esta ilustración muestra un molino de viento que 
capture la energía del viento. Ésta es una fuente reanudable 
de la energía.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">nicht erneuerbare Energiequelle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quelle der auswechselbaren Energie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wind</string>
          </keyword>

            <string language="x-mt-de">Windmühle</string>
          </keyword>

          <keyword>
